scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd yourchatstarter-frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.do-depend: cd yourchatstarter-backend && npm install && cd ../yourchatstarter-frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.do-start: cd yourchatstarter-frontend && npm run build && cd ../yourchatstarter-backend && pm2 start App.js
scripts.do-start-with-python: cd yourchatstarter-frontend && npm run build && cd ../yourchatstarter-backend && pm2 start App.js && cd ../yourchatstarter-phobert && nohup python3 app.py
